name: Primary Care Behavioral Health
description: As a part of the San Francisco Health Network (SFHN), the Maxine Hall Health Center provides the following primary care behavioral health care services: - Short-term behavioral health counseling (6 to 8 sessions) for mild to moderate conditions - Referrals to San Francisco Behavioral Health Services for substance use counseling and/or higher need clients
